SEARCH
Package service

Class NotificationService

java.lang.Object
service.NotificationService
public class NotificationService extends Object
The NotificationService class provides methods to manage notifications related to book reservations. It interacts with the NotificationDao and ReservationDao to perform CRUD operations on notifications.
